name: Goblins' Labyrinth
description:
Goblins' Labyrinth is a stealth-ish game made for AI Jam 2015. I accidentally got a bit away from the AI theme (more is explained in-game if you're curious), but I think it turned out alright. It's nothing very original. The level changes as you walk around, which I thought was neat. Your goal is to escape the goblins' labyrinth/lair and reach the exit portal. Without dying. Hopefully.

(Note: I haven't tested this on anything other than Windows, though it should theoretically work fine.)
